events.message: I am reporting an auto accident that occurred yesterday afternoon when another vehicle rear-ended my car at a stoplight.
The claim has been classified under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and notes from the call.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with further inquiries and document collection.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and will keep you updated during the process.
Please provide copies of your vehicle registration, accident photos, and the police report to proceed with the claim.
All requested documents, including the police report and photos of the damaged car, have been submitted successfully.
Our claims investigation team has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and incident details to assess liability.
The investigation concluded that the other vehicle was at fault, allowing us to proceed with your claim.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover your car repairs and rental expenses during the repair period.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the prompt handling of the claim and the offered settlement terms.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation and settlement agreement.
We have issued the payment covering the repair costs as per the approved claim settlement.
The claim has been officially closed after confirming that all repairs were completed satisfactorily.
All records related to this auto accident claim have been archived in our system for future reference.
